about_the_game:
Midnight Stories

This VISUAL NOVEL continues the life of Cindy and the rest is full of side stories with various people and hot scenes. This way you can explore all kind of kinks and pleasures and topics.
The game is in 4K ultra HD resolution and fully voiced. For the side stories a huge numbers of voice actors will be delivering crystal audio for your pleasure.

The MS5 has the following episodes:
Episode 01 - A Surprising Truth (Cindy) (includes paths)
Episode 02 - Michelle and Paula
Episode 03 - Afterparty (Katie and Victoria) (includes paths)
Episode 04 - The Betrayal (Cindy)

The game has renders with sound effects and characters are fully voiced.

content_descriptors.notes: The game contains scenes with sex and explicit genitals are visible. Genitals might appear in some renders as well. Sexual violence is included, in a very mild form or only partly in consensual sex scenes as part of the act but absolutely willingly. Drugs and alcohol are no main topic but can appear in story relevant quests and dialogues. Self-harm is not included.

linux_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: any Linux version
  • Processor: 32bit Intel compatible Dual Core CPU
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: 512 MB Graphics Card
  • Storage: 4 GB available space
linux_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: any Linux version
  • Processor: 32bit Intel compatible Dual Core CPU
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: 512 MB Graphics Card
  • Storage: 4 GB available space

  • Processor: 32bit Intel compatible Dual Core CPU

  • DirectX: Version 10

  • Processor: 64bit Intel compatible Dual Core CPU
